website_summaries.verdict: A small table with a few extra features to keep the party going.
pros: Both cooler and cocktail table, features a convenient icebox hidden in the base
Sturdily build, and a durable material
cons: When the cooler is full, it may fall over if someone leans on it

website_summaries.verdict: Multi-functional rattan piece that's a cooler, cocktail table, and pub table all in one.
pros: Keeps drinks ice cold for hours
A smaller cooler (just under 32 quarts), this piece can adjust in height from 22.5 inches to 33.2 inches to double up as a side table or pub table
The top pulls up to access the cooler, which can keep drinks cold for hours
A sturdy piece, it’s made of resin wicker, making it weatherproof with no metal pieces to rust, and easy to clean
cons: Some problems with the shipping, with poor packaging and damaged goods

website_summaries.verdict: A small patio table with the added bonus of a 7.5-gallon cooler. Comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Unique design features a cooler base and handy pop-up table
Has a bottom plug that makes it easy to drain
Works well on patios and porches with limited space
cons: Color is attractive, but it may fade after extensive time in direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Breaks and Keter won't honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to use on our patio as it seemed perfect for our space. The center tube that supports the top to the base cracked making the table unusable. Contacted customer service who asked for original receipts and photos of defect. Sent both and then didn't hear back for 3 months. Was offered a fractional refund instead of a replacement. I was told this was all they could do. Sad that Keter cannot make reliable products and even worse that they won't honor their warranty. I would definitely look elsewhere for a better product and a more honest company who stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: ascNYC

customer_reviews.title: Looks bad after one summer, steer clear from KETER products.
customer_reviews.text: After one summer the top looked terrible! I contacted KETER customer service based on their own description noting "Being weather-resistant, this piece can be left outside without worrying about rust, decay and other weather-related damage.". Their response was to put WD40 on it. I would never purchase a KETER product, as they don't stand behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: ShopSmart

customer_reviews.title: Wife thought it was dumb... at first... now she shows it off to guests...
customer_reviews.text: Works well--deceptively deep (took nearly 30 lbs. of ice to fill it!). Drain plug is a pain: it doesn't pull out easy and the entire drain assembly comes out when pulling on the plug top. Plug should have a string to allow user to pull it without having to dig down to find it (suggestion to buyers: add a mark of some sort higher along the side to show you where the plug is to reduce your time digging into the ice). Would recommend a cover, especially in areas where there is a lot of tree pollen (the Rattan texture grabs a lot of dirt/pollen).
customer_reviews.author: Tim Eichman

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic for the price point. I wanted a makeshift lounge area to relax in while grilling at my beach home and since it's just a garage I wasn't looking to spend an arm and leg. Put together, this looks like I paid 5x what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! If you twist the inside piece (as directed) it stays up just fine. Don't let other people's reviews deter you from buying this. I get so many compliments on it :) The plug on the inside makes it easy to drain and the inside is large enough for many items. See attached photos (sorry, it had just rained).
customer_reviews.author: dd15

customer_reviews.title: The screw feature is poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product never worked properly and doesnt stand up. The screw feature is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danny nissim

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, matches other rattan furniture we have
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, matches other rattan furniture we have. as for keeping beverages cold for hours, not so much. Because it's not insulated a 10 lb. bag of ice was melted after about two . opened it up to check on it and it was like a sauna in there. I guess not meant for outside use in the summer ?
customer_reviews.author: borednow

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: This is the most functional outside table ever. Just like the picture shows, it can be used as a cooler with ice (it takes 3 10 lb bags to fill) or just as a regular table. The latch that holds the table in the up position is very secure however when in the up position the table top cannot hold a heavy amount.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Stenhouse

customer_reviews.title: ... cover the top of the table - maybe a nice piece of round glass
customer_reviews.text: I might have to find something to cover the top of the table - maybe a nice piece of round glass? Water gets into the top through that chrome opening in the middle of the top. The rubber stopper in the ice well is too small to get a good grip on for pulling out. It's very difficult to pull it even when there isn't ice-cold water surrounding it. But, I do like this as a nice side table (and personal eating table) on my patio. It matches my rattan furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tjoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pub Table for Hot Tub
customer_reviews.text: There's never enough places in a hot tub to place your drink and this table solves the problem. Easy to assemble. Pretty sturdy. Wish it stood maybe another 4" taller but all in all, it's a convenient table next to the hot tub. When not in the hot tub we use it in between our chaise lounge chairs. We're happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betteed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Item was cheap plastic & arrived broken due to poor packaging. For the money & purpose it might be nice but it was a gift and I will not be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2-for-1 patio addition!
customer_reviews.text: These perfectly match our espresso brown wicker patio furniture and make perfect end tables. The top has to be all the way up to turn the lock in place. (Tip: Add ice AFTER beverages.) About 1 bag of ice fits over drinks. We leave the tops down which impressively keeps drinks cold for 4-6 hours on an 80' afternoon in part/full sun. Beverage "ring" marks wash off easily, and there's a plug inside to aid draining. (We've left it unplugged, and cans were still cold and not as wet from melted ice, which is nice.)
customer_reviews.author: A. Schottmuller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The table is very easy to assemble with only 2 parts and 3 small screws. The top lifts and locks into place very easily. The "cooler" section is larger and deeper than I thought, so you can fit a good amount of bottles or cans in there. When the top is extended this can be used with bar height chairs...not so much for dining but perfect for cocktails. It isn't actual resin wicker but instead is molded plastic...but that's to be expected at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: RGARCH

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of lock
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to put together but it doesn’t sit straight. The table is in 2 pieces and screws together with 3 screws. Before you screw it together it sits fine, after it’s screwed together it’s crooked. But the big issue is it doesn’t lock which was the whole point of the purchase. It almost took my fingers off when it crashed down even when it was in the locked position. Of course the packaging has all been broken down and thrown away so returning isn’t an option, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Top does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, holds drinks well and keeps cold with ice for quite awhile. My only complaint is that the turn mechanism to tighten the center pole in order to keep the table propped up does not tighten well. The top still falls down of its own accord anyways even with nothing on top of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tops don’t lock in place when raised.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I purchased two of these and neither one stays up when the top is lifted. They will not lock in place properly when raised making it impossible to set anything on the raised top. Any weight at all causes it to push down. Good idea but does not work in actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good and unique
customer_reviews.text: This is a good patio cooler/table for the money. The product arrived with small scratches in the top (it is all plastic) but other than that it was a breeze to assemble. Fit and finish were pretty good, better than I expected. It has a nice little drain plug at the bottom of the ice well that you can remove to drain the cooler compartment. If I had a minor complaint it would be that the manufacturer could improve the locking collar that keeps the top elevated when it is used as a table, it sticks and is sometimes hard to lock in place. Again, good value for what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Norman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table/cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler, it's the exact same color as my outdoor wicker patio set so it fits right end. I can get about 2 bottles of wine and some drinks and bottled water inside along with a bag of ice. I get so many compliments on the table then when they see it does double duty as an ice cooler they're just blown away. Don't hesitate buy this table you won't be disappointed . A must have for summer
customer_reviews.author: Love2design

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables! We ordered 2 to use as side tables. They are very easy to put together (3 screws - just had to find them inside the main component!). Just got them this week, but they appear to be very durable. The only "drawback" is that the table is not adjustable - it's either up (if you want it "locked" in place) or down. You could put it at an intermediate height between fully up and closed - bu it would not be "locked" you could twist the mechanism to hold i fairly tight, but not sure how many items i would hold then. We can' wait to use them full with ice!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! There are missing protective parts, that are supposed to protect the base from the floor
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I called the manufacturer's customer service. I found online their tel 877-638-7056. They do not have it on their website. I was told, "We know about the missing 'feet' to protect the base of the cooler. We only have a drain plug or screws to send to customers. They do not have the protective feet to send. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! It will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea. Poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Mechanism to hold table up failed on first use. There is a locking collar you rotate to hold the tabeltop in the raised position. Unfortunately the plastic used is not stiff enough to retain it's shape. While this is a cool idea and resists weather well, it is not well-built enough for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent conversation piece.  Big hit with visitors, or for hanging out in the backyard.
customer_reviews.text: This large ice bucket table is very easy to set up. It's lightweight enough to move around, yet looks heavy. Really nice-looking and will impress your friends! Keeps ice well all day long in 100-degree weather, amazing. You can put an object on top of the pop-up table for decoration. When you're ready to drain it, just pull the plug, works fast. Easy to close the top back down at the end of the day. So glad we got it, and now the friends want one too.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but it will hold drinks
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shipping and assembly was quick & straightforward, no complaints there. What I find flimsy is the center rod is plastic and just doesn't provide a lot of support without drinks in it. The other deduction in stars is that when you pop it open, you have to bend down and twist the base to keep it locked. Wish you could just turn the table top and it would hold. Not the case. Will it hold three cases of White Claw & Ice? Yes. So that's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaK

customer_reviews.title: It's well made.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice as a gift, its that good. You can use it as a table, and open it up to store ice and booze, whips and chains, hid purchases from your husband, all kinds of things. It's durable, so if your drunk friend knocks it over, it doesn't break. Then, later, when aforementioned friend that wasn't really invited anyway, pukes on it, you can easily hose it off. You can't churn butter in it.
customer_reviews.author: emily g.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to Lower/Raise Tabletop
customer_reviews.text: I love convertible furniture and planned to use the Keter Pacific Tablel/Cooler also as an attractive storage container for two outdoor chair covers. I expected an easy-open/easy-close experience. PRO: attractive, sturdy feel, easy assembly (just 3 screws to attach midway inside the table). CON: raising and lowering the lid was difficult. That part ruined it. After tugging and twisting the lid when the cooler was empty and sliding around on the floor, I was too tired to dance again. I’m guessing that once the weight of bottles and ice are added to the base, the lid might raise easier, yet I don’t trust that it will ever perform smoothly enough for my easyOn easyOff needs.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It will hold around 20 bottles of beer. If you put a lot of different drinks in here it may be difficult to find what you want, but that's not the fault of the manufacturer. I bought two of them. They're very nice looking and reasonable quality. If it were a bit cheaper I'd give it 5 stars, but I think the price is not a "super bargain" or anything like that. I got what I paid for and I'm pleased, so, four stars will do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is amazing. After months of outdoor use it still has it color and is still sturdy. It has a opening on the side you can use to release the water once the ice melted. Speaking of ice I was also shocked at how long the ice stayed frozen and the drinks stayed cold. After a few uses the top portion becomes easier to open. Also this is very easy to assemble. Just a few steps and your setup
customer_reviews.author: Gameboyblock

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Keter
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in how flimsy this table was after just a couple of uses. It broke while extended with just 4 glasses and a full bottle of wine placed on it. I made multiple outreaches to Keter to see if this was a one off anomaly and to get a replacement but they can’t be reached- no responses from the multiple submissions for help on their site... I recommend buying a similar from another company.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for my pool deck area.
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a little table for my pool deck area where I have some chairs under a pergola, this table turn out to be perfect since I also have some Keter storage bins around so they match color and design, on top of that, now we also have a cooler for wine, beer and soft drinks. As a table is very nice and stylish, as a cooler is perfect, we just pour a small bag of ice and voila, we have nice cold drinks when using the pool/pergola, everyone has compliment our latest addition, they seem to love it too, great idea. Love the little drainage so is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile 3 in 1 patio table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match my patio swinging chairs. It matched perfectly! I also received this item one day earlier than expected! I especially like the 3 in one feature. 1. You can raise the table height (perfect for keeping my large dogs from getting into stuff on the table). 2. It also is a storage cooler for your beverages. 3. It is a nice low table for just sitting out on your patio with your drinks. I would definitely recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic !!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these along with the matching chaise lounge chairs. Absolutely fantastic product and brilliant idea for the ice bucket below. Keeps our kids' soda's cool as they lay by the pool, in the pool, on a floaty - you name it. Great quality - looks resort quality. Some other reviewers commented on the top of the screw head you can see on the table. This didn't bother us at all, and there is something called a dap of paint if you're concerned. We generally have too much stuff on top of the table no one sees it !
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: beautiful modern accent to my brand new condo patio
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing things to go on my brand new patio for my new condo presented a challenge as the space is very large. Wanted to fill it with modern yet very pretty objects was even harder. When I finally picked out the lounge chairs finding the table to go in the middle was a no brainer as soon as I saw this. Not only is it a beautiful modern table but it is also a table that can be used to fill with drinks and ice to keep things cool and long hot Vegas days.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fox Blog

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Look and Extremely Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! We've had this for a year and a half and love it. It holds a lot of ice and wine and the table is roomy. It stays on our lanai and our cats love it when it sits there by the windows, closed. I have to say you should read the instructions when you get it. I didn't and missed the part about the plug in the cooler. Thankfully, when the ice water leaked out, it was in our lanai. That only happened once and it was my fault., It still looks great whether we are using it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Latour

customer_reviews.title: Five stars isn't enough!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler was my favorite purchase of the summer! After using this cooler several times over the past several months, I'm still as much in love with it as the first time. Everyone who sees it wants one. Not only is the cooler a statement piece but it holds plenty of bottles of wine and other beverage along with a few bags of ice. The cooler doesn't leak and the top tray stays in place at all times. I'm glad I read another reviewer suggestion to tie a string to the stopper to make it easy to get out. I did that from the start and have never a problem. I highly recommend this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: KEC

customer_reviews.title: Im SOOOOO HAPPY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt expect this to be all that great .. I bought it from the warehouse .... was suppose to come with a defect.. NOT A SCRATCH!!!!! 3 Philips head screws is all it took to be put together... ITS PERFECT!!!! Light weight... And absolutely FRICKEN COOL!!!! I live in a SW Florida RV resort... this is the PERFECT addition to my outside living room. I cant wait to have people over on the weekends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose table.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I decided on this table after looking at a few both online as well as in stores. The biggest selling point for us is the cooler aspect. While we haven't had a chance to use it yet, having the opinion to use it as a cooler was something we couldn't pass up. The item came as described and after taking two minutes to to attach the bottom half to the upper half, the table moved out to our patio. No issues with the top staying up as long as you follow the instructions. The little silver thing in the middle is not a huge concern. Build quality seems good and overall it fills out needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Keen

customer_reviews.title: Scratched, missing parts
customer_reviews.text: No screws provided, no legs provided, and scratches all over the surface. Looks used and i can't even fasten the only 2 pieces provided together. Definitely not worth the price unless these issues are resolved. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and so close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: The good: Works great as an end table on the patio. Can’t wait to have a party (post-covid) & try out the ice bucket. The bad: I agree that the silver disk in the center is disappointing. I just put a small succulent on it to hide it. What’s really annoying is the silver disk has a hole so rain can get in. Also the top doesn’t close tight so some driving rain during FL summer monsoons gets right in. I have to leave the drain open to make sure water doesn’t sit in it.
customer_reviews.author: EngineeringMom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is as stated, but beware of lifting the tabletop and tightening to hold into place. My middle finger and ring finger suffered some pretty significant cuts on them due to the protruding sharp plastic pieces on the seams of the tightening grip. We actually had to file the pointed plastic areas down so this didn't reoccur.
customer_reviews.author: ddwhtng

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use as a table as well as cooler.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our outdoor patio because it can be used as a side table, a cooler, or both. It is normally a table beside out patio furniture to put drinks on. When we entertain, we put ice in the cooler portion to minimize trips into the house for more refreshments. With the ice in the cooler, you can still use the table in the lower position or lock it in the upright position to make a table to stand around and place your drinks on . I bought this after seeing it on a friend's patio and it is well worth the price for me! We love it
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this table..!
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. Very well built and keeps beverages ice cold. I don’t understand some of the negative reviews on this table. I recently had a get together and the table was the talk of the party. I didn’t have time to clean it out after the party so I left the ice in it till the next evening. To my surprise the table still had ice in it and it was 90+ degrees out. If your thinking about this addition to your patio, just do it. I Am very satisfied. By the way this was not my wife’s pick. I chose it and she now likes it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Q-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! I bought two for our fire pit area & they are just perfect! When we entertain, everyone is always super impressed! Even if you don't use them for the cooler, the table itself is nice. They're pretty & versatile; what else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Erin M-L

customer_reviews.title: great table BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The style of the table looks great. The main issue I have is the table DOES not hold up well. It keeps falling down when you raise the cooler top part up even if nothing is on it. When I reach into the cooler it closes on my hand. I do have it in lock position, but it still keeps falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: I’d give this a 4 out of 10.
customer_reviews.text: It is made of a cheap grade of plastic. It weighs about 10-15 lbs, which makes it easy to lift and change locations but means you can’t leave outside or a little wind and it might become your neighbors, or get in the pool. I’m not sure why there is a hole in the top of the table, but maybe I need to look and see if there is an umbrella I can buy with it? I’d give it a 4 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Delaine Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. These are well made and hold 12+ bottles. Filled with ice and no leaks. Don't let the light weight fool you, I actually appreciate the make because it's allowed me to take this on the go. Compliments my deck area so well I bought a 2nd one. Even had 2 people who were visiting become impressed and at first glance they went out and purchased their own the next day. The price is a bit of a tough pill to swallow however believe in the long run you'll be very happy with this investment.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Keeter is a great brand for outdoor furniture. Very durable. I first purchased this brand 6 years ago, plant containers. Live in south Texas. They are in direct sun --- and they can handle the heat. color doesn't fade. Then, purchased standing seed planter three years ago, storage container and now this --- quality is great. price is great. lightweight, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality item and services
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for almost a month for this item to be finally delivered, it was damaged and cracked in 2 spots... after talking to amazon customer service, I have to disassemble the item again to ship it back?!?! Even if I wanted to try and glue and fix it it is not going to work. They can’t fix the item anyway... Horrible experience and very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Matches our existing furniture well. Does a decent job keeping drinks cold and ice from melting but of course, an actual cooler would work better. The dark color gets hot in the sunlight. When it rains it fills up with water (even the top) so it needs to be drained.
customer_reviews.author: John Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures and description online we thought this would be an amazing table for our patio. Not only could I put my current drink on it but we could have out next drink staying cold waiting for us inside the cooler. While that is possible it sucks that the manufacture did not want to include the screws that are on the parts list so this can be done. I’ve even attempted to contact them without success.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because of all of the recent negative reviews. Especially the ones about receiving damaged or missing parts. I took the risk and ordered not just one, but two of these. They arrived one day later. They were in perfect condition and extremely easy to set up. They were a gift for my mom for her birthday. She loves them and was super excited to put them out next to her pool. If you’re still off put by the negative reviews regarding shipping, you can buy these at wal mart as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great convenient table!
customer_reviews.text: The table is exactly what it looks like in the pictures, really convenient, light, and so far haven't had any problems with it. I keep it outside in my backyard and does great in the rain. Just make sure it doesn't fly away lol. It's made out of plastic so it does seem little fragile but so far it's doing good and holding.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Conversation Starter!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on this table for a long time now, like longer than a year, but I finally bit the bullet and purchased it and I love it! I don't know why I waited so long. It is a lot bigger than I thought it would be, which is a good thing! It fits a good amount of beers and ice. And it very substantial as a side table. We used it two days in a row and all of my friends were so impressed by it! It was a huge hit! I think I might have sold some of them on buying one as well! Don't hesitate, just get it!
customer_reviews.author: SOCCERCHICK24

customer_reviews.title: Cool table
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is nice but one of the screw holes for assembly wasn't predrilled. It doesn't seem to be a huge deal though. It's still sturdy without the third screw. The directions were a bit confusing at first as well. I had trouble figuring out how to lock the tabletop in the extended position but after watching another customer's review video, I felt pretty silly lol it's a cool little table & I'm happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely have given this a 5 star review if it didn’t collect water in the top piece. We’ve had to empty out the water after a big rain storm several times now and I think it’s because of that silver hole in the top. I do love the look of it and it’s the perfect size so overall I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say I’m happy about it. Table itself is very easy to assemble and it’s well designed. Have to say they have a very poor quality control. The shipping box isn’t damaged but the table is, so keep your finger crossed if you are considering to buy this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Great fun addition to my deck
customer_reviews.text: Great fun addition to my deck. Put together in seconds. From previous reviews it was mentioned the table didn't stay up once drinks are on it. Well, I put it to the test with three heavier glasses filled with water, stayed up! I recommend this table, glad I purchased it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for party patio areas!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the reviews scare you. Most were not even locking the top part correctly. Its a beautiful table, great size, pretty pattern, light weight, 2 part assembly with 3 screws. Durable. Easy to use. We love ours!! If you don't like the very small silver part in the center of the table, easily get a round placemat, adds a little color and looks great! I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faiths Wings- Crystal Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little table/cooler at all
customer_reviews.text: I understand what the reviews saying it broke or cracked mean it is a bit flimsy in the core where you hit closed or open I can see that being an issue if you man handle it but this little table holds up -it’s worth the money. I like it. I left it outside during a rain storm (s Florida) and it did just fine on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and size of this table cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love. It came with little or no assembly with about three screws. The table pulls up and stays locked very well. From past reviews, stated table closes when placing items on table that is not accurate, you have to turn the lock inside the table pole. It is labeled to lock. The other reviews said the table wasn’t attractive, that’s not true. The top looks great as well, if you like to put a table may on it that would be great too, but I’m loving my new deck accent addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome, that simple
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says it is and, it’s pretty awesome. There’s a bunch of people who couldn’t figure out that you twist the collar (pictured) instead of spinning the table top to lock it. RTFM people, it clearly shows how to do this. Looks great, operates great, had it together in under 5 mins. super happy with this, it’s a solid good buy.
customer_reviews.author: simon pratchett

customer_reviews.title: What a great patio idea!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tables for our patio. We store things in them like speakers, tissues, bug spray...all out of sight. We haven't raised them or used them as coolers because that's not we bought them for. I put red round place mats on the top and they look great. We've had them for about 8 months in the Arizona heat and are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fordham

customer_reviews.title: They are a great look for any patio or deck.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what warmth means for this rating, but please note that this cooler does not keep things cool over time because there isn’t an insulation and the laters aren’t thick enough. The water does have warmth eventually. I absolutely love the look and for that, it’s a keeper. I’m going to disassemble it and add foam insulation in it for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with no screws
customer_reviews.text: My box did not have any screws in it, so I am unable to secure the top half to the bottom half. Also, I don't know if the top needs to be secured to the bottom for the lid to raise up, but I cannot get the top of the table to raise to provide access to the cooler inside. I have twisted (rotated) the top with no results. I would likely give this a five star if I had received the screws and could get the top of the table to raise up!
customer_reviews.author: Moosegirl

customer_reviews.title: ITS GREAT FOR ENTERTAINING- Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Great we set it up thinking it was a novelty between the outdoor dining and seating area and our friends loved it. It has a plug at the bottom for the water to drain out and the top holds surprisingly well. it held a Plant in a pot and lots of drinks. the only complaint that i had is that the ice melts pretty quick on a hot day since if you dont keep it closed it will melt simple physics. I am going to make a plexy glass lid to try to slow this down a bit but i will let you know. So far Great for entertaining and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Haven’t put ice in the cooler section, but the table is very nice. Collapsed, it’s a perfect little table for outdoor use. We brought it inside for the big game last weekend along with a few stools. It was wonderful to have 3 more seats and a table. It takes up a small footprint, so we were really happy. Great housewarming gift. I already have a few friends and family in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dobolina

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a party we were having in our new home. Showed up without the stopper for the cooler. Tried Customer Care and the number provided "Is no longer accepting calls". Finally got through to Keter customer service via the web and was told it will take 3 months to get the stopper shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lampert

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool multi purpose item for a small outdoor space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cooler. It serves its purpose. The ice lasts long enough for a gathering but melts by the next day. It remains cool though. I think there should be some rubber bottom inserts for the bottom of it to help protect the floor. Overall, I am happy with its function. It works and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: LHolden

customer_reviews.title: Protect your booze!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend. We noticed when you set glasses or drinks on top of the cooler...as displayed in the product picture, it stoops to one side. This made us naturally really hesitant to put anything on top, specifically of the alcohol variety, in fear of it falling off or shifting more and the glass falling!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dee

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Like: - No need to set up. Everything is provided out of the box - Affordable (I paid $42 during a deal session) - A simple table to add to the collection Dislike: - Has a plastic type feel compared to other similar style chairs (material) - Table when pulled up can be a little less sturdy (I use it down) - Table should rise a little higher. It's in between a little awkward height between sitting and standing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier when filler with ice. The table top isn't sturdy enough to put lots of things on. I just put the cups and napkins on it. It's a beautiful piece and it got loads of compliments!!! It seems as if it'll be easy to clean... just rinse it down. I got it for my parents and it's on their screened in patio so it wont get dirty. Oh it's easy to drain as well
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ASSEMBLY HARDWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Received in timely manner. MISSING HARDWARE REQUIRED TO ASSEMBLE! Have requested duplicate hardware. We’ll see what happens... I’ll complete this review when I recieve hardware
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: Ain’t No Stopping Stopper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product in theory but was tricky to assemble for me. Also the stopper is deteriorating:falling apart which defeats the purpose of having an ice cooler ...I don’t want it to leak during use. I sent a Keter request foe new part and will update review on service when they respond
customer_reviews.author: KareenK

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and attractive, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for - and has the built in cooler to boot. I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that the top would not "snap" to position, rendering the cooler portion unusable because you can't get to it since the top will not stay up. I did not return the product because it would have been more trouble to box it up again than to simply use it as a table.
customer_reviews.author: Strange

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect little end table for our outdoor space. It's so easy to assemble that my eight-year-old put it together. The table adjusts at multiple heights and is a nice shade of dark grey. We haven't put ice/beverages in it yet, but are looking forward to using that feature the next time we entertain.
customer_reviews.author: The Doyles

customer_reviews.title: Great drink tables for the patio!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. So much sturdier than I expected. Everybody complains about the hardware in the middle of the tabletop but it's not that bad. I just put a solar lamp on it. I love the ice chest double functionality and love that you can adjust the tabletop to be waist-high. Great purchase and addition to my patio.
customer_reviews.author: DorisDiana RN

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. If functioned well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for an outdoor party. It worked great. If functioned well, and was at the right height when standing. So many of our friends asked us where we got it, because they liked it so much. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CorgiLover

customer_reviews.title: Hot deal at a cool price!  One of a kind bar table cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It fits perfectly with my patio furniture, and I love the idea that it is a cooler! I am so happy because when I finally got to try it out to find out how “cool” it keeps my drinks, it really worked! It was a hot and sunny day (92 degrees), and I was able to use it all day... even when I woke up the next day, the drinks were still cold with some ice leftover! This is way better than I expected for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: CAT, Pittsburgh, PA   2020

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to use, of great use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father and he did send me photos of it but they will not upload for some reason. He has had this item for a whole month and he loves it ! This is his summer go to. The water from ice does not leak out and it keeps his drinks cold the WHOLE Day. The water is easy to dump when finish done and ready to store. It has not broken like some reviews said and idk how ppl could say it would break easily because it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Louu

customer_reviews.title: Best of both!  Keep your wine chilled and table top!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item quickly, is exactly what I was looking for for my patio. It's exactly as described and the color is a beautiful chocolate brown. Plenty of room for your beer, wine, sodas or whatever you want to sit back and chill out with. I highly recommend this product and will purchase another as a gift for my adult children.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hargenrader

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this ice chest/table for the party we were hosting at our pool/back porch. Everyone loves the look and it’s functionality and I was asked where I got it. We put ice only when we have party, but still it is a really good looking table. It matches with other Keter patio trash and we love the look. We are mostly using under our covered deck, so hoping the color will not fade quickly. So far, we are very happy with the purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: cybergirl

customer_reviews.title: Table lock portion is weak - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, I followed the instructions and assembled the table. The turning plastic lock doesn't hold the table securely with any weight placed upon it. It is suppose to hold 110lbs, even states it in the instruction manual. The lock is poorly made. Great idea for a table. I returned it and found a table with a metal shaft, and a screw type lock for the table table top. It was more expensive but it worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time's a charm
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one as a gift and the locking mechanism didn't work. We returned and replaced it with a new one that seems to work much better as the top actually locks in place now. If you're having trouble turning the lock, it's probably broken - the new one that works for us doesnt take much strength to turn. Very easy to replace, though, of you run into troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: They last, and don't deteriorate with the sun beaming at them all day!
customer_reviews.text: It's 2020 and these are still the same as the day I bought them in 2017. They stay in the sun all day with no shade next to my pool. Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Works/looks good
customer_reviews.text: It assembled in about 2 minutes. Only has 3 screws and looks/works as advertised. It matched the color of my fire pit perfectly. Very useful for holding drinks and snacks at different heights. So far has held up to being outside with little more than a quick dusting to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baugh

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this piece
customer_reviews.text: This totally made my outdoor enclosed porch area complete! The fact that this is a cooler AND a table all in one really saves so much space and it puts a little extra surprise when I show guests. I absolutely love this piece. The quality is also very very nice. I will continue to purchase pieces from this company since it matches my furniture PERFECTLY!!! DISCLAIMER: I am an Amazon reviewer and I paid full price for this item and this is my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for both sets of parents. They love it. Easy to assemble and holds ice well. Also easy to drain and looks really nice to be a cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Cook

customer_reviews.title: Molded Plastic, Not Braided!
customer_reviews.text: This is molded plastic and not braided. If you are looking for the braided version, then look elsewhere. I had problems taking it up and letting it down. I was not an easy process. The table itself does the job if you don't plan on letting it up, or down and you don't plan to use it as for storage.
customer_reviews.author: acer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler! It holds more than it appears to hold. It matched perfectly with my decor. Everyone was so impressed with it. I would highly recommend this product. It is sturdy and was easy to assemble. The screws for the base were taped inside. So, I didn't see them at first. It only took a few minutes to assemble. Our drinks stayed cold all afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. I had to return it because the table did not stay up in the lock position. It looked damaged as if the seller resold me an item that may have already been returned for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Whole in top holds water
customer_reviews.text: Great size, easy to set up and use after reading about "twist" in directions. Looks Great on patio. Has survived 5 kids playing outside around it. That said make sure you either tape up the hole on the top or keep it under a cover for rain and morning do because it will collect a ton of water in the top not bottom where the spice and drinks are supposed to go but it's top part. Home ICE about as well as a cheap cooler... a 10 lb bag should last you the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie greer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality end tables to replace old worn out ones on patio. Very sturdy and well built. Matched my resisting patio furniture perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Amazing how much you can put in this thing. Holds plenty of ice and beverages. Has a nice drain plug on the bottom, it’s stylish and I’ve had many compliments. I put it together in two seconds! Hi and humid summer in New England, every weekend is spent by the pool, I would fill this on a Friday night and still have ice in it Sunday afternoon
customer_reviews.author: loni

customer_reviews.title: It was difficult to put together. The seams did ...
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put together. The seams did not line up. When I tried to screw the top to the bottom the piece the screw went into cracked. It collects and hold water when it rains because there is an open spot on the top of it that has no purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself during prime days this summer. Great idea, but i did some upgrades. Drilled a hole in the side towards the bottom and hooked up a hose to drain. Also added some foam insulation underneath to add life to the ice. Definitely a game changer for cocktails on the porch. Hahaha. Neighbors love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived category 2 hurricane!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the deck at our beach house in the Outer Banks to use strictly as a table. Filled the base with sand due to coastal winds and only leave the top "up" when we're using it. Just went through Hurricane Dorian and didn't budget!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble..3 screws that’s it. Seemed to be very sturdy and match all of my other Keter products. “Do not sit on”...is in the instructions would be great if there was a placard or something tasteful that is visual..there’s always that one idiot in the group that’s going to think it’s a stool. I liked it so well I bought 3 !
customer_reviews.author: BLACKDOG

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase. I needed at least one table to set along side my hot tub and ended up buying two of these so that I'd have an extra for warm weather get togethers. The table top is even with the top of my spa when pulled up and is working out well. They came well packaged and protected and look better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: kat432

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a manufacturing defect and I had to waste my time returning it for a replacement, which will take another 10-15 days to arrive. This should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Shopperson

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift or to have for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is a Christmas present for my mother and father-in-law and they absolutely love it figured it would be great for the cab in the backyard or wherever people are gathering and having fun and drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Inked Mom

customer_reviews.title: It is a definite conversation starter that functions great.
customer_reviews.text: Have use this for several parties on our patio. Everyone who sees it loves the concept. Plus it matches our patio furniture color and style of materials. I would only make one minor change. The rubber stopper at the bottom of the ice well could ne designed with a little larger or wider tab to make pulling it up afterwards to permit drainage of water.
customer_reviews.author: Topspin

product_meta.title: Keter Pacific Cool Bar Outdoor Patio Furniture and Hot Tub Side Table with 7.5 Gallon Beer and Wine Cooler, Espresso Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownWant to convert your Cool Bar from cooler/coffee table into a party-perfect cocktail table? Simply lift the lid and twist the locking ring. Voila! Cold drinks, Cool Bar, instant party! And to keep the party going, the Cool Bar's 7.5 gallon cooler can keep drinks chilled for more than 12 hours! The top rises smoothly from 22.5 inches to 33.2 inches in overall height and locks into place to prevent it from falling when topped with party provisions. And when you are done, simply remove the built in drainage plug for easy cleanup. When you’re ready to change the mood, the top of the cooler can be twists back down into a sleek cocktail or coffee table. As friends gather around the Cool Bar, you can feel confident that this contemporary piece adds just the right element of class and style. So whether you want a stylish accent table or a functional party accessory, you can have it all -- with the Cool Bar from Keter. While the compact design will easily fit into the layout of even the smallest deck, patio, or yard space, if you have larger outdoor living areas, you can place one on either side of each sofa, love seat, or chair to use as end tables. It would then be easy enough for you to pull out all of the Cool Bars and stock them with beverages and ice whenever you decide to host a large gathering. Features & Benefits: • Dimensions: 19.5D x 33.2H in. • Lid extends upwards into table 10 in. above rim • Sturdy engineered legs for optimal support • 7.5 Gallon drink storage capacity to handle up to 40 12 oz. cans with ice • Built in drainage plug makes cleanup a breeze • Beverage cooler keeps drinks ice cold for up to 12 hours • Sleek contemporary design blends with a wide variety of indoor or outdoor patio decor • Table top locks in place for easy access to drinks • Weather-resistant - can be left outside without worrying about rust, decay and other weather-related damage • Easy to assemble, easy to maintain and easy to use • Perfect centerpiece for your outdoor gatherings or summertime parties
feature_bullets: IDEAL SIZE: Dimensions: 19. 5 D x 33. 2 H in.
POP UP TOP: Lid elevates upwards 10 inches above the rim for use as a cocktail table
HIDDEN COOLER: 7. 5 gallon drink storage capacity to handle up to forty 12 oz. cans with ice
RESIN CONSTRUCTION: It's made out of all weather-resistant resin with an appealing rattan-look texture
EASY CLEANUP: Drainage plug for easy cleanup in a pinch
GIFTS FOR DAD: The perfect gift and bar accessory for the #1 BBQ Grill Master in your life
VERSATILE USE: Use as a patio coffee table, bar table, drink cooler, and raised hot tub table

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,532 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
